en-US.summary: A collection of transformational and faith-inspiring Christian podcasts from Edifi.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Christian Podcast to play featured episodes
Alexa, tell Christian Podcast to see recommended channels list
en-US.name: Christian Podcast
en-US.description:
"The earth shall be full of the knowledge of the Lord as the waters cover the sea." (Isaiah 11:9)  

Are you looking for transformational and faith-inspiring Christian podcasts? Enable the Christian Podcast Skill — a truly powerful skill that brings together thousands of the best Christian podcasts in one place for your listening enjoyment.

Christian Podcast is filled with the best Christian podcasts — safe content that will edify and inspire your faith. With the Christian Podcast Skill, you can easily listen to the latest episodes featured on Edifi along with popular channels. You can also quickly search for new podcasts by channel or topic, and discover phenomenal, new Christian podcasts in the process. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Just talk to Christian Podcast Skill. We'll have featured episodes and recommended channels if you’re not sure which podcasts to listen to. Or search channels or episodes by keywords when you want to listen to a specific podcast.

You can say...
-Alexa, open Christian Podcast
-Alexa, tell Christian Podcast to play featured episodes
-Alexa, tell Christian Podcast to list recommended channels
-Alexa, ask Christian Podcast for my playlist
-Alexa, tell Christian Podcast to search channels
-Alexa, tell Christian Podcast to search for episodes about 'Jesus loves me'
